for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n=int(raw_input())
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    a=sorted(a)
    if len(a)%2!=0:
        for i in range(1,len(a)-1,2):
            val=a[i]
            a[i]=a[i+1]
            a[i+1]=val
        print ' '.join(str(a[k]) for k in xrange(len(a)))
    else:
        for i in range(1,len(a)-1,2):
            val=a[i]
            a[i]=a[i+1]
            a[i+1]=val
        print ' '.join(str(a[k]) for k in xrange(len(a)))
